column4: i setup kubuntu -desktop I SEE MORE PROGRAM  ADD TO ME AND I WANNA KNOW HOW TO USE PROGRAM LIKE NETCUT EXE I CAN SETUP IT EASY  BUT CANT USE
you mean, the netcut on windows that does arp spoofing?
well first off all turn off caps lock
and for the arp spoofing, you can use very manual tools like arpoison, or easier-to-use ones such as arpspoof (from the dsniff suite), or ettercap
